meanings.definition: Infection with parasitic roundworms of the genus Strongyloides.
meanings.sent1: Strongyloidiases can cause stomach pain and diarrhea.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with strongyloidiases after conducting tests.
meanings.sent3: The strongyloidiases in the soil were having a party, but no one wanted to join.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a tangled mess of strongyloidiases, impossible to unravel.
meanings.sent5: The image of strongyloidiases crawling through his intestines haunted his dreams.
